item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。拜登政府正在考虑加强贸易限制，这将对科技股造成压力。在一次独家专访中，我们将介绍特朗普在税收、贸易等方面的计划。以下是您需要了解的内容。【原文：Good morning. The Biden administration is considering toughening trade restrictions, weighing on technology shares. And Trump’s plans for taxes, trade and more in an exclusive interview. Here’s what you need to know. — Morwenna Coniam】

item.title: 伦敦房租通胀放缓 缓解租户压力
item.description: 伦敦租金通胀率五个月来首次回落至个位数，但六月份租户支付的租金仍达到创纪录的近2100英镑（2738.7美元）。【原文：London rental inflation eased to single figures for the first time in five months, though tenants still paid a record of almost £2,100 ($2,738.7) in June.】

item.title: 美联储威廉姆斯称近期通胀数据积极，但仍需更多数据
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行行长约翰-威廉姆斯说，最近几个月的通胀数据令人鼓舞，但他需要看到更多进展。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams said inflation data over recent months has been encouraging, but he needs to see more progress.】

item.title: 国家成本飙升，德国计划削减可再生能源补贴
item.description: 由于政府成本上升，德国计划削减和改革对可再生能源生产商的补贴，此举可能会加剧未来投资的不确定性。【原文：Germany plans to cut and reform subsidies it pays to renewable energy producers because of rising costs for the government, a move which may fuel uncertainty over future investment.】

item.title: 俄罗斯游戏使秘密油轮换油更难追踪
item.description: 两艘几乎相同的油轮试图对抗西方制裁。在伊朗和阿曼之间的中途秘密转运俄罗斯原油。一艘超级油轮提供虚假地点。【原文：Two near-identical oil tankers trying to beat western sanctions. A secret transfer of Russian crude halfway between Iran and Oman. A supertanker giving a false location.】

item.title: 美国人现在投资什么
item.description:
股票？IRA?投资基金？是的

Stocks? IRAs? Investment funds? Yes

】

item.title: 布隆迪因货币短缺而出现长达三周的排队加油现象
item.description: 在出租车司机让-保罗-恩萨比马纳（Jean-Paul Nsabimana）在布隆迪首都加油站排队加油的三周时间里，肯尼亚发生了致命的抗议活动，南非迎来了新政府，英国更换了首相。【原文：In the three weeks taxi driver Jean-Paul Nsabimana spent lining up for gas at a filling station in Burundi’s capital, Kenya saw deadly protests, South Africa ushered in a new government, and Britain replaced its prime minister.】

item.title: 贝卢斯科尼继承人称未来商界胜过政界
item.description: 已故意大利前总理西尔维奥-贝卢斯科尼的长子贝卢斯科尼曾想追随父亲的政治脚步，但现在他表示自己将致力于家族的广播事业。【原文：The eldest son of late former Italian Premier Silvio Berlusconi was tempted to follow in his father’s political footsteps but for now he says he’s committed to his family’s broadcasting business.】

item.title: 安哥拉部长称，安哥拉对持有葡萄牙公司Galp和BCP的股份 "非常满意
item.description: 安哥拉计划继续成为葡萄牙贷款银行Banco Comercial Portugues SA和石油公司Galp Energia SGPS SA的投资者，同时出售其他资产以加强财政。【原文：Angola plans to remain an investor in Portuguese lender Banco Comercial Portugues SA and oil company Galp Energia SGPS SA, while it sells other assets to bolster its finances.】

item.title: 日元反弹撼动市场，美元跌至 5 月以来最弱
item.description: 美元跌至近两个月来的最弱水平，日元的大幅反弹放大了这一走势，并在全球货币市场引起反响。【原文：The dollar tumbled to its weakest level in almost two months, a move amplified by a sharp rally in the Japanese yen that reverberated across global currency markets.】

item.title: SK 集团将合并能源部门以帮助陷入困境的电池业务
item.description: 韩国第二大企业集团 SK 集团将合并两个与能源相关的部门，进行重大重组，以巩固亏损的电池业务的财务状况。【原文：SK Group will combine two energy-related units as South Korea’s second-largest conglomerate undergoes a major restructuring in a bid to shore up finances in a loss-making battery business.】

item.title: 印尼商业银行称，印尼股票观察名单可能阻碍外资流入
item.description: 据彭博情报公司（Bloomberg Intelligence）称，印尼交易所将不稳定和陷入困境的公司列入观察名单，这可能会加速外国资本从东南亚最大的股票市场撤离。【原文：The Indonesian exchange’s watchlist for volatile and troubled companies is likely to accelerate an exodus of foreign capital from Southeast Asia’s largest equity market, according to Bloomberg Intelligence.】

item.title: 菲律宾能源公司 PXP 因报告称可在南海勘探而大涨 50
item.description: 据一家新闻机构报道，中国政府已经取消了对南海能源勘探的暂停令，PXP Energy Corp. 周三大涨 50%。【原文：PXP Energy Corp. jumped 50% on Wednesday after a news outlet reported that the government has lifted a moratorium on energy exploration in the South China Sea.】

item.title: 日元对美元汇率上涨 1%，抑制进一步干预的必要性
item.description: 日元兑美元汇率扩大涨幅，反弹了 1%，从而降低了日本当局再次入市支持受困货币的必要性。【原文：The yen extended its advance to rally 1% against the dollar, reducing the need for Japanese authorities to step into the market again to support the beleaguered currency.】

item.title: CVC Capital Partners 收购波兰软件公司 Comarch 并将其退市
item.description: 私募股权基金 CVC Capital Partners 和波兰软件生产商 Comarch SA 的部分股东计划收购该公司，并将其从华沙证券交易所退市。【原文：Private equity fund CVC Capital Partners and select shareholders of Polish software producer Comarch SA plan to buyout and delist the company from the Warsaw Stock Exchange.】

item.title: 部长称乌克兰 "法律 "问题阻碍俄罗斯向匈牙利出口石油
item.description: 匈牙利最高外交官称，匈牙利和俄罗斯正在努力恢复因乌克兰所谓的法律问题而中断的石油流通。【原文：Hungary and Russia are working to resume oil flows after they were halted due to alleged legal problems in Ukraine, according to Hungary’s top diplomat.】

item.title: 阿布扎比马斯达尔公司将发行绿色债券推进可再生能源电力发展
item.description: 阿布扎比清洁能源公司马斯达尔（Masdar）计划分两批出售以美元计价的绿色债券，这是该公司为扩张筹集资金而进行的第二笔此类交易。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s clean-energy firm Masdar plans to sell dollar-denominated green bonds in two tranches, its second such deal as it looks to raise funds for expansion.】

item.title: 印尼保持关键利率稳定以维持卢比强势
item.description: 印尼央行周三维持政策利率不变，连续第三次会议延续了谨慎的暂停政策，以维持对印尼盾的支持。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank left its policy rate unchanged on Wednesday, extending its cautious pause for a third straight meeting to sustain support for the rupiah.】

item.title: 阿玛尼、迪奥面临意大利劳工行为反垄断调查
item.description: 意大利竞争管理局对奢侈时尚集团乔治-阿玛尼公司（Giorgio Armani SpA）和路威酩轩集团（LVMH）旗下克里斯汀-迪奥公司（Christian Dior）控制的一些公司展开调查，指控这些公司存在不公平商业行为。【原文：Italy’s Competition Authority opened an investigation into some companies controlled by luxury fashion groups Giorgio Armani SpA and LVMH’s Christian Dior over alleged unfair commercial practices.】

item.title: 矿业公司 Fortescue 在全球范围内裁员 700 人，进行重大改革
item.description: 澳大利亚矿业和清洁能源公司 Fortescue Ltd. 周三发表声明称，将在全球范围内裁员 700 人，并简化业务结构。【原文：Fortescue Ltd. will cut 700 jobs across its global operations and simplify its business structure, the Australian miner and clean energy company said in a statement on Wednesday.】

item.title: 交易员减少对英国央行 8 月降息的押注，因为通胀被证明是粘滞的
item.description: 在英国通胀数据显示潜在价格压力顽固之后，交易员们越来越相信英国央行将在下个月保持利率稳定。【原文：Traders grew increasingly convinced the Bank of England will hold interest rates steady next month after inflation data in the UK pointed to stubborn underlying price pressures.】

item.title: 英国服务业通胀乏力令降息前景存疑
item.description: 英国公布的服务业通胀率高于预期，促使交易商收回了对下月降息的押注。【原文：Britain reported stronger than expected inflation in its services sector, prompting traders to walk back bets on an interest-rate cut next month.】

item.title: 创纪录的私募基金经理追逐日益减少的德国交易
item.description: 在德国、奥地利和瑞士，有创纪录数量的投资经理正在追逐私人资产交易，试图利用作为该地区经济支柱的中小型企业的代际更替。【原文：A record number of investment managers are chasing private asset deals in Germany, Austria and Switzerland, seeking to take advantage of generational change in the small and medium-sized businesses that are the backbone of the region’s economy.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：通胀数据逼近，股市有望反弹
item.description: 2024年7月16日星期二，英国斯特罗德，一名购物者在等待过马路。在英国央行下月做出是否降息的关键决定之前，杂货价格通胀率降至 2021 年 9 月以来的最低水平，进一步表明成本压力有所缓解。摄影师克里斯-拉特克利夫/布鲁姆伯格【原文：A shopper waits to cross the road in Strood, UK, on Tuesday, July 16, 2024. Grocery price inflation fell to its lowest level since September 2021 in a further sign of easing cost pressures, ahead of a crucial decision by the Bank of England next month on whether to cut interest rates. Photographer: Chris Ratcliffe/Bloomberg】

item.title: 国际同行纷纷撤退，新加坡律师被吸引到中国
item.description: 新加坡最大的两家律师事务所正在中国扩张业务，它们看中的是中国公司进军海外的趋势，即使它们的一些全球同行正从中国这个世界第二大经济体撤出。【原文：Singapore’s two largest law firms are expanding in China, banking on a trend of Chinese companies venturing overseas even as some of their global peers pull back from the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 欧洲最大企业有更多回购和交易空间
item.description: 欧洲最大企业的财务杠杆率预计将在今年降至 2008 年全球金融危机以来的最低水平，从而有可能派发更多股息、进行回购和并购。【原文：Financial leverage at Europe’s biggest companies is expected to ease this year to the lowest since 2008 and the global financial crisis, potentially allowing for more dividends, buybacks and M&A.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 据说安联将出价收购新加坡收入保险公司
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，安联集团正在考虑收购新加坡收入保险有限公司 51% 的股份。【原文：Allianz SE is considering making an offer to buy up to 51% of Singapore-based Income Insurance Ltd., people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 日本为支持日元而采取的干预措施收益递减
item.description: 日本上周在货币市场上的明显背靠背行动凸显出，要在不削弱干预效果的情况下让交易员保持警惕，很难把握时机。【原文：Japan’s apparent back-to-back forays in the currency market last week highlight the difficulty of timing moves to keep traders on guard without diminishing the effectiveness of intervention.】

item.title: 阿联酋航空 "希望 "中国谈判将为更多航班铺平道路
item.description: 阿联酋航空公司（Emirates Airlines）"希望 "本周阿联酋与中国之间的会谈将为这家海湾航空公司拓展其在世界第二大经济体的业务铺平道路。【原文：Emirates Airlines is “hopeful” talks this week between the United Arab Emirates and China will pave the way for the Gulf carrier to expand its presence in the world’s second-largest economy.】
